name: Maria Tarbaieva
tagline: Hi, I am a UX/UI Designer. I am helping users to achieve their goals by creating solutions to improve the user experience. I am design user-interface smooth pages that promote user interaction with the information.
body:
## SKILLS

* User Interface Design
* User Expirience Design
* Mobile Applications (IOS, Android, Blackberry)
* Web design (Responsive)
* Graphic design
* Infographics
* Adobe design programs
* InVision
* UXPin, Axure

## CAREER HIGHLIGHTS:

### May 2013 - January 2016. UI / UX Designer
* User Experience
* User Interface Design 
* UI for mobile devices 
* Responsive Design 
* Interaction Design 
* Graphic Design 
* Layouts for printing 
* Infographics
* 2d Animation

### January 2012 - October 2013. UI Designer, Graphic Designer

* User Interface Design 
* UI for mobile devices 
* Graphic design 
* Layouts for printing

### August 2010 - January 2012. Graphic Designer

* Design layouts for printing 
* Corporate style

### October 2009 - August 2010. Freelance Designer

* Websites layouts design 
* Graphic design

## LANGUAGES

* English - upper intermediate 
* German - beginner
* Russian - native
* Ukrainian - native

## EDUCATION

Kharkiv National University after G.S.Skovoroda, faculty of design
